name: Implementation Contact
title: IMPCON
definition: Identifies the customer employee or office responsible for control of installation and completion.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is “N”, “C”, “M”, “D”, or “T”.
Required when the ACT field is “R” and the TQ field is populated.
fieldNotes: During installation, the provider will notify this person when the end user requests activity in addition to the activity specified on the ASR.
This is the contact to be used for completions, acceptance testing and other such related installation activity.
